text: وَأَمَّآ إِذَا مَا ٱبْتَلَىٰهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّىٓ أَهَـٰنَنِ

translation.en.sahih: But when He tries him and restricts his provision, he says, "My Lord has humiliated me."
translation.id.indonesian: Adapun bila Tuhannya mengujinya lalu membatasi rezekinya maka dia berkata: "Tuhanku menghinakanku".
